original_title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Tren a Las Nubes
overview: Salta, capital of the province of the same name in the north west of Argentina, is the starting point of one of the most fascinating train journeys in the world. A sight worth visiting before boarding the train means a journey by cable car on the city's mountain, the Cerro San Bernardo and it takes ten minutes to reach the top of the mountain that towers above the city.
title: On Tour Exploring the Extraordinary Tren a Las Nubes
